mapper.sql: lf_id, limit_name, action_name, parent_id, creation_time, modification_time
mapper.select: select lf.lf_id, lf.limit_name , lf.action_name, lim.limit_name parent_name, lf.creation_time, lf.modification_time from limit_function lf left join limit_function lim on lim.lf_id=lf.parent_id
mapper.insert:
insert into limit_function
lf_id,
limit_name,
action_name,
parent_id,
creation_time,
modification_time,
#{lfId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{limitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update limit_function
limit_name = #{limitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_name = #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modification_time = #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where lf_id = #{lfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update limit_function set limit_name = #{limitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_name = #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modification_time = #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where lf_id = #{lfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from limit_function where parent_id is null
